name: Candy Block Puzzle Blast
description:
Candy Block Puzzle Blast is a classic puzzle game and totally free. You can enjoy it anytime and anywhere .no need of WIFI or data.

It's simple and easy, just drag and drop and fill up all the grids. But once you play it, you will be addicted to this block puzzle.

The goal of this game is to place blocks to eliminate a whole row or a whole column on a vertical or horizontal line on the grid. The more candy blocks you remove, the higher the score you will get. Remember that if there is no extra space in the grid then the game is over.

Candy Block Puzzle Blast Features:
• Classic block puzzle
• Cute and funny candy design
• Simple but fun
• ios free download
• Support global rank boards

How to play:
- Drag the block onto the pad
- Try to put them all in rows or columns
- The more block you eliminate at once, the higher scores you will get
- If the grid cannot put the new block below, the game will end
- candy block can not be rotated

You can play anytime, anywhere! We really hope you like it!
Let's try the game now!
